sections.title: Installation
sections.content: Set the firmware to EFI OS and deactivate Secure Boot. If GRUB UEFI will not be loaded after installation and configuration, then the GRUB EFI executable might not at the right location. In this case, the GRUB EFI executable can be moved to the right location on the EFI system partition as described in GRUB#Default/fallback boot path.

sections.title: Booting linux ≥ 5.18.15
sections.content: linux ≥ 5.18.15 modifications prevent to boot with the AMD A6-1450 CPU. This happens due to the modifications addressing Retbleed preventing booting on some AMD CPUs (see FS#75478). As a workaround add spectre_v2=off to the kernel command line, as suggested in the Arch Linux Forums.
